::SnowCat::

She turned on her cloaking device and walked out of the ship. She ran 
out, slight in front and too the side of Ramulus.  She wanted to keep 
him wthin her sight, just in case.  But she also wanted to scout 
around just befor the meeting.  Even thought they said they would be 
alone, she knew that the Trainers were just as smart as they were.  
If Ramulus could come up with cloaking devices, so could the 
trainers.  But she had to bare in mind, the cloaking device cloaked 
signature, sight and all visable parts of the bot.  The only thing it 
didn't cloak, was scent. And she wanted to test with her nose, not 
her eyes or Radar.  She stayed about 50 yards out from Ramulus, with 
him still in eye sight and sniffed around. But she knew it would be a 
while untill they reached the meeting place.
